pros: There is unity, support, teamwork, growth opportunities and good work ethics among the staff.
cons: Not much bulk hours for work.

job_title: Events and Fundraising Coordinator in Aberdeen, Scotland
pros:
Really great people work at cyrenians, it feels like a family there. 
V flexible in terms of work and what you want to focus on in the evets team.
cons: Salary was poor the amount of sales, promoting the charity and writing reports - higher salary would be expected
